column1: Uchi////lets take a quick aside.  $12 for a carafe of coffee.  I am perfectly ok with this.  generously sized (that was nice)
column5: creamers at the table.  wish they provided more raw sugar packets
column9: everything sounds good with the world.  except that the coffee is complete garbage.  its thin as the water itself but still finds a way to ruin the palette.  they might as well be using sysco.
